授業目的: この講義では、国際安全保障に関する既存研究の中でも理論的成果と実証的成果の基礎を概観していきます。学生は戦争や紛争の原因について学ぶことになります。
到達目標:
この講義の到達目標は三つあります。
（1）国際安全保障研究の中でよく知られている文献を知るようになること。
（2）批判的に判断を下す能力を身に付けること。
（3）学生各自の研究プロジェクトに発展するような面白い研究課題を見つけること。
授業方法:
I will give online lectures. From session 3 to session 14, students are required to take in-class pop quizes by accessing MS Teams account. Students are required to bring a PC or a smartphone to handle quizzes easily. All materials related to the lectures are copyrighted. Don't upload to any SNS and website.

Guest access to LUNA (LMS) is allowed during the first and second weeks. Zoom link is presented in the announcement.

トピック.授業外学習2: This is an introductory course and has no prerequisite. However, the course requires your strong concerns about the subject and a certain amount of self-study. If you have never studied international relations theory, you should take it before taking this course.
